name: Xylophone [VR]
description:
After the first time Adele introduced me to VR, I wanted moore. Rather, more.

Then one day, I was reminiscing about playing the Xylophone in high-school (since I sucked at Soccer, Basketball and Table Tennis) and I wondered if it were possible to create one in VR.

So I did some sketches, modeling, and Unity. Here's a really rough Proof of concept.

Things:

  • Demo was a 2-day build. Started Friday and finished Saturday afternoon, with me regretting the entire plan on Friday night and Bible study on Saturday morning.
  • The Unity tutorials I was following broke with the latest Oculus Integration for Unity. Getting the hands to work was trouble.
  • The Xylophone I made is of a pentatonic scale. With two octaves. I'm in the key of F(-Major) IIRC.
  • I'm still building and I'd love love love feedback and criticism :) (please be kind, if you can)
